body: Up to three times per day the wielder can cast a spell with the sonic descriptor that causes those who take damage from that spell to take a –2 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and ability checks for a number of rounds equal to the actual spell level of the spell cast as though using the Concussive Spell feat.
name: Concussive Metamagic Rod
